constraints.name: non_increasing
constraints.description: 每轮操作后，双方的筹码数均不会增加

constraints.name: termination_condition
constraints.description: 当赢家的筹码数不少于输家时，游戏结束

constraints.name: probability_distribution
constraints.description: 每轮游戏中，Alice 赢的概率为 p0，Bob 赢的概率为 p1，平局的概率为 1 - p0 - p1

constraints.name: loss_amount
constraints.description: 如果赢家的筹码数少于输家，则输家失去与赢家当前筹码数相等的筹码
